channel.title: Help with a certain shop?

item.title: Help with a certain shop?
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

[code]}
if (c.myShopId == 73) {
if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough PK points to buy this item.”);
}

		}
		if (c.myShopId == 74) {
			if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
					c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
					c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You do not have enough PK points to buy this item.");			
			}

[/code]

This is suppose to use pk points to buy items but It keeps using a different point system than what I am specifying. dont know why this isnt working correctly.

Read full topic
